Comments_Questions: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
Comments_List: Hindi grammar, fluency, listening comprehension, and oral proficiency.
I gained a lot of knowledge of Hindi grammar, and skill speaking in Hindi.

This course was good for learning Hindi, but it could've been better in terms of improving Hindi vocabulary and understanding documents and speech by native speakers. I think having a larger component of the class be speaking in Hindi and reading/watching/listening to Hindi media would improve the course.
Yes, to any student wishing to begin studying Hindi or who wishes to improve their Hindi, this is a fantastic language course at the University.
I would, with the caveat that you need to take initiative on your own to take full advantage of the course; what you put in is what you get.
